name: OffensiveAudioClassifier
summary: A powerful library for iOS developers to detect offensive language and hate speech in audio files, with support for SwiftUI and UIKit.
description: The OffensiveAudioClassifier library integrates voice-based offensive content detection in iOS apps, utilizing Apple's Speech framework and a BERT-based machine learning model. It accurately identifies offensive language and hate speech, supporting both SwiftUI and UIKit for content moderation and sentiment analysis.
